chapters.title: Prologue: The First Message
chapters.info: Abell Cauthon, p. 39 (40)—Mat's father. He and his wife Natti live in Emond's Field with their two unmarried daughters Eldrin and Bodewhin. They have two other daughters. Abell is excellent with a bow and arrow, and is in general a really nice guy; Mat does not know of anyone that dislikes him. His children are about the age where they start to leave home—twenty, seventeen, and sixteen for Mat, Eldrin, and Bode respectively. See also Cauthon, Bodewhin; Cauthon, Eldrin; Cauthon, Matrim; Cauthon, Natti.
